QuestData.Title: The Twilight Plot
QuestData.Description: We came here to investigate rumors of a Titan artifact up at the Masters' Gate to the southwest.$B$BOne of those Twilight's Hammer cultists must have the plans for what they're doing up there. You're going to have to get them for us, $n.$B$BKill cultists at the Masters' Gate until you find them.
QuestData.CompletionText: Those plans are the key to everything.
QuestData.RewardText: <The examiner takes a look at the plans that you hand to him.>$B$BThis is just gibberish!$B$BWhat does this even say? What language is that?
